title: minerjones

created_time: December 04, 2023, 06:36:00 PMLast edit: December 08, 2023, 08:37:12 PM by minerjones
content: 2017 Lealana 0.5 XMR brass coins x5#28, 39, 107, 111, 126**This auction will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auction****ie. 1 @ xxBTC, 2 @ xxBTC, up to the maximum of 5 coins****Winners will chose serial numbers based on win order**STARTING BID PER COIN: 0.500 XMRMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER COIN: 0.005 XMR**Please limit bids to ONLY 3 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 9th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT:BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qts or XMRSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.body: All lots: 0.51 XMR eachSeems like I missed something here, were there single 0.5 XMR coins released by smoothie? Or did they come in rolls?I only remember the 5 XMR singles and the sets of 4 coins denominated below 1 XMR.

comments.author: phishead
comments.body: Wow, I’ve been out of the game for a while. LIFO? Sheesh.1 & 2: 0.55 xmr (I think?)Nice to see everyone again. Hope all has been well.

comments.author: Tibu
comments.body: Quote from: phishead on December 07, 2023, 01:35:41 PMWow, I’ve been out of the game for a while. LIFO? Sheesh.1 & 2: 0.55 xmr (I think?)Nice to see everyone again. Hope all has been well.LIFO : Last In First Out, meaning if you are the last to bid the same bid, you are out.Bid'er 1 says : 5 @ 0.55 XMR,Bid'er 2 says : 1 @ 0.55 XMR, he is out.If I'm not wrong in my understanding
